title: Hygienist Questions Your Diagnosis
summary: A hygienist disagrees with your perio classification and questions you in front of the patient. Maintain unity in the room; strengthen clinical alignment in private.

scene.setting: A hygienist disagrees with your perio classification and raises it in front of the patient. You feel ego threat; the hidden risk is undermining team authority. The growth opportunity is clinical alignment culture.

beats.narration: The hygienist has just questioned your finding in the room. The decision point is correct publicly or keep unity and discuss criteria after.

dialogue.speaker: hyg
dialogue.line: I'm not sure that fits the perio criteria we use.

dialogue.speaker: doc
dialogue.line: I want the patient to see a unified team. We can discuss criteria right after.

choices.label: Correct the hygienist in front of the patient and restate your diagnosis.

steps.step: Same-day private calibration; share perio criteria doc.

leader_lines: Let's align on criteria after the visit.
questions: What part of the criteria feels unclear?
scripts.closing_line: Unity in the room; alignment in private.

choices.label: Acknowledge the question, support your finding briefly, and suggest we discuss criteria after the visit.

steps.step: State finding briefly in room; defer detail.
Same-day debrief; shared perio criteria or calibration.

leader_lines: Good question. Here's my read; we'll discuss criteria after.
questions: What would help us align on perio codes?

choices.label: Invite the hygienist to share their view, then explain your rationale and confirm the plan.

steps.step: Invite one sentence from hygienist; then state rationale and plan.
Document who decides when there is disagreement.

leader_lines: What's your read? Then I'll share mine and we'll confirm the plan.
questions: How do we document who owns the diagnosis when we disagree?
scripts.closing_line: Clinical lead owns diagnosis; team can question privately.

choices.label: Defer entirely and say you will review the chart later.

steps.step: Same-day debrief; clear perio protocol in writing.

leader_lines: We'll review after and close the loop.
questions: How do we close the loop so this doesn't recur?

system_prompts.nudge: Unity in the room; alignment behind closed doors.
system_prompts.mirror_call: Did you win the moment or win the team?

outcomes.message: The patient sensed tension. The hygienist may hold back next time.
reflection_questions: What would have changed if you had unified first?
How do you align clinically without public conflict?

outcomes.message: Calibration is in place. The team questions privately; the patient sees unity.
reflection_questions: How do you document who decides when there is disagreement?

tsp.weekly_pulse_prompt: This week we kept unity in the room and aligned in private. (1-5)
